ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Deemos helps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but to no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base. My wife, you see

Deemos helps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but to =
no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base.

"My wife, =
you see she in hurt, and I need to use your CR Chambers, I have been told t=
hat this is the base of the mighty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell Bea=
st? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell Beast=
's base.

Sinesis slowly crawled along, pushing Sinister's parts. Sinesis s=
topped every mile to catch his breath, his jets her wrecked. He kept going =
and going and going.

Plintissa seen a letter from Dracona, saying she had =
retruned to base. Plintissa shrugged and walked along her way. Artist tripp=
ed her up and walked on ahead. Plintissa felt like crying again, this is th=
e one she loved? Artist laughed and went on his way.

Dracona picked up the=
 device, but suddenly, the device exploded, sending a fireball into the Pre=
dacon base. (Megatron's base) Dracona gasped. She had better be going now. =
She slowly started to sneak away.

The Radicons hurried on their way, maybe=
 some other team would apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Airbomber=
 just hoped that Infectra would come with them.

Lightmare's spark joined t=
he Matrix, she is DEAD.

Gangon's spark hovered in front of BrightBlade, sw=
irling around her over and over again.
